name: Snakelock
description:
Snakelock is a game where you push blocks around into their specified area as a snake to complete the level. you can not crash into anything or the level will reset. Otherwise, you can push blocks around

How to Play:
WASD - Face direction to move
SPACE - Start Level/AccelerateTAB - Reset Level
ESC - Main Menu

This is only a prototype and demo that was intended as a release for Untitled Game Jam #65 where the theme was snake. Expect Bugs
